rows.label: qst102204_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey there! Thanks so much
for helping out.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0002
rows.name:
Kathira told me about all the
cool stuff you've been doing.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0003
rows.name:
I hear you're traveling with
some incredibly rare Blades?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0004
rows.name:
I worked with some folks who
were Drivers, back in the day.
Man, they were strong.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, but I shouldn't keep you when
there's work to be done! Just go ask
Corden if anything's not clear.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0101
rows.name:
Hey there! Wow, you sure made
short work of those monsters! Kudos!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0102
rows.name:
I'm pretty busy with a new task -
I've been put on cooking duty!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0103
rows.name:
For my first mission ever, they're
sure not making it easy, I tell you!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0201
rows.name:
Hey, I heard you talking with the chief!
You're gonna help me out, huh?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0202
rows.name:
That's a big help. I never expected
to be cooking on my first mission,
let alone finding the ingredients myself!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0203
rows.name:
The mercenaries of Hr√¶svelgr are
a hardened bunch, that's for sure!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0204
rows.name:
In that case, could you help me find
a couple of ingredients I need?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0205
rows.name:
Cooking, I'm actually pretty good at,
but I have no idea where to find
ingredients around these parts.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0206
rows.name:
Besides, even if something goes
horribly wrong, I feel like you guys
would be able to handle it.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0207
rows.name:
Sorry... I just had a bit of a bad
experience a few years back.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0208
rows.name:
Thanks for the concern,
but I'm all right.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0209
rows.name:
So the ingredients I'm after are
7 Shade Trouts and a Tarnish Apple.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0210
rows.name:
I'm not sure where to find them,
though... Corden and Kathira might
know this area better than I do.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0211
rows.name:
Anyway, good luck!
I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0301
rows.name:
Did you find those 7 Shade Trouts
and a Tarnish Apple yet?
I'm counting on you!

rows.label: qst102204_msg0302
rows.name:
Corden and Kathira might have an idea
where to find them. Me, I'm stumped.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0303
rows.name: Careful out there, OK?

rows.label: qst102204_msg0401
rows.name:
Corden will brief you on the
next mission.

rows.label: qst102204_msg0402
rows.name:
When that's over, I want you to tell
me all about the time you fought
with Vandham!
